Life Time Membership Sales

Competitive Analysis, User Research, Interaction Design, UX Design, UI, Front-end Development

Summary

  • Multiple offline and backend processes have been replaced by an online membership builder.
  • In less than a year online the site now accounts for over 30% of all new memberships created.
